Entries.9581348/e 2128292/t 1600 1800:
continue/-1000 -1000/farmer 22 19 0 Shane 23 10 2 Alex 22 13 0 Gus 19 11 1 Pam 20 10 2/viewport 22 11 clamp true/skippable/move farmer 0 -4 0 true/move Alex 0 -4 0 true/proceedPosition Alex/playSound thudStep/warp Alex -100 -100/move farmer 0 -1 0/move Shane 0 1 2/speak Shane "嘿，你来了啊！$6#$b#我很开心你能过来。我们该出发了……$6"/move Pam 2 0 0/move Pam 0 -1 0/warp Pam -100 -100/playSound thudStep/move Gus 3 0 0/move Gus 0 -2 0/faceDirection Shane 3 true/playSound thudStep/warp Gus -100 -100/move farmer 0 -4 0 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/playMusic none/pause 800/playSound busDriveOff/pause 4000/changeToTemporaryMap Stadium false/speak Shane "我们快到了……"/pause 1500/playSound glug/pause 500/speak Shane "*嗝*……比赛前总是感觉紧张……$10"/pause 1000/playMusic Stadium_ambient/warp farmer 19 19/faceDirection farmer 2/positionOffset farmer 0 16/warp Alex 14 12/faceDirection Alex 2/warp Gus 30 14/faceDirection Gus 2/warp Shane 22 12/pause 3000/advancedMove Shane false 0 7 -2 0/viewport 22 18 clamp true/proceedPosition Shane/faceDirection Shane 2/
          speak Shane "来，我给你也带了瓶苏打水……"/ -- changed from beer/
          showFrame Shane 25/pause 1000/playSound coin/showFrame 90/showFrame Shane 0/pause 2000/farmerEat 184/pause 1000/animate Shane false true 200 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 21 22 23 24 24 24 24 23 22 21 20 20 20 20/pause 6000/animate Shane false true 400 0 30 0 30 0 31 0 31/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 1000/speak Shane "嘿，我一直想说…… $6#$b#谢谢你陪我一起度过这一切……我的焦虑、抑郁……你知道的……$6#$b#你一直是我的挚友。$6"/pause 2000/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 4000/speak Shane "话说，这是你第一次看格球比赛吧？"/pause 1000/speak Shane "$q -1 null#嗯，你觉得呢？#$r -1 10 event_stadium1#Noisy... 这让我意识到家里是多么让人感到安逸。#$r -1 10 event_stadium2#很有趣……相比之下，鹈鹕镇让人感到很无聊。"/stopAnimation Shane/pause 100/jump Shane/showFrame Shane 18/pause 1000/speak Shane "啊！看，隧道队在进攻！$10"/showFrame Shane 0/pause 1500/playSound Stadium_cheer/pause 500/showFrame Shane 31/jump Shane/textAboveHead Shane "进球了！"/jump Alex/jump Gus/pause 100/textAboveHead Alex "进球了！"/pause 2000/jump Shane/pause 2000/showFrame Shane 34/positionOffset Shane -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Shane -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Shane -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Shane -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Shane -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Shane -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Shane -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Shane -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Shane -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Shane -2 0/pause 10/showFrame farmer 94/pause 800/showFrame farmer 0/pause 800/faceDirection farmer 1 true/animate farmer false true 100 101/pause 1000/pause 2000/stopAnimation farmer/showFrame Shane 12/positionOffset Shane 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Shane 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Shane 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Shane 2 0/pause 1500/faceDirection Shane 1/speak Shane "哦！……$10"/move Shane 1 0 1/
          speak Shane "嗯……对不起……我太激动了。$10#$b#我不知道我刚刚怎么了……"/ -- changed from comment about having too many drinks/
          pause 3000/faceDirection Shane 3/pause 800/move farmer 2 0 1/pause 1000/animate farmer false true 100 101/positionOffset farmer 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset farmer 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset farmer 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset farmer 2 0/pause 10/showFrame Shane 18/pause 800/showFrame Shane 0/pause 800/showFrame Shane 34/specificTemporarySprite heart 22 18/pause 3000/viewport move -1 -1 5000/pause 3000/globalFade/viewport -2000 -2000/pause 3000/playMusic none/pause 1000/speak Shane "嗯……真是场精彩的比赛。$l"/pause 2000/speak Shane "哦，对……而且我们也赢了。$l"/pause 1000/pause 1000/speak Shane "好吧，再见。$6"/pause 2000/end

Entries.97/f Clint 750/t 1900 2300/d Tue Wed Thu:
none/4 18/farmer 14 24 0 Clint 4 19 2 Emily 10 11 0 Gus 15 18 1 Shane 7 18 1/skippable/move farmer 0 -3 3/emote Clint 28/pause 500/move Clint 0 -1 3/move Clint -3 0 0/pause 500/playSound openBox/pause 150/playSound shiny4/pause 400/playMusic desolate/move Clint 3 0 2/move Clint 0 1 2/move farmer -3 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 3/faceDirection Shane 2 true/move farmer -3 0 3/faceDirection Shane 1 true/move farmer -3 0 3/faceDirection Clint 1/speak Clint "您好，@……要不要和我坐一起？"/pause 400/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 800/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection Clint 2/speak Clint "让我跟你讲讲我在想些什么吧。$u#$b#我没有什么女人缘，@……*叹气*$s#$b#但和我打过交道的人都知道我是个好人，真的！$u"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 0/emote farmer 28/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 3/speak Clint "女孩子似乎都很喜欢你，@……^你是个女孩，@……"/speak Clint "$q 211 null#你有什么秘诀吗？^你有什么建议吗？#$r 211 25 event_advice1#靠你的能力和魅力打动女性#$r 211 25 event_advice1#做些疯狂的事情，让别人猜不透你#$r 211 0 event_advice2#表现得正常一点儿……做你自己就好#$r 211 25 event_advice1#把女人当男人一样对待"/speed Emily 4/move Emily -6 0 2/speed Emily 2/move Emily 0 4 2/doAction 4 16/playSound openBox/stopMusic/move Emily 0 3 1/move Emily 1 0 2/move Emily 0 1 3/pause 400/pause 700/speak Emily "嗨，克林特，今晚想来点什么？$h"/pause 600/faceDirection Clint 1/pause 200/speak Clint "好的！"/pause 300/speak Clint "呃，我是说……请给我来个大份儿干酪。再多浇一份酱汁。$s#$b#……$u"/faceDirection Clint 3/faceDirection Emily 2/pause 300/faceDirection Clint 2/speak Emily "嗨， @。"/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 0/faceDirection Clint 1/speak Clint "呃……*清嗓子* 谢……谢谢，艾米丽。谢谢你……给我点单。#$b#那个，艾米丽？我……*吞口水*……我在想……$h"/pause 300/faceDirection Emily 3/emote Emily 8/pause 400/speak Emily "克林特，怎么了？$u"/pause 500/emote Clint 28/pause 1200/speak Clint "……算了，没什么。$s"/faceDirection Clint 0/playMusic sadpiano/pause 300/faceDirection Emily 2/pause 300/faceDirection Emily 3/pause 500/move Emily 0 -1 1/move Emily 1 0 1/faceDirection Shane 3/speak Emily "嗨，谢恩！这是你的饮料。$h"/pause 300/faceDirection Shane 1/pause 400/
          addObject 8 17 612 1/ -- changed from beer to cranberry candy drink/
          playSound woodyStep/pause 400/faceDirection Shane 3/pause 300/faceDirection Clint 1/speak Shane "谢谢，艾米丽！$h#$b#那么……这会儿忙吗？"/speak Emily "还好！谢谢你的关心，谢恩！$h#$b#你有新的小鸡故事吗？"/pause 600/emote Clint 28/pause 500/faceDirection Clint 2/pause 800/speak Clint "*叹气*$s#$b#我没救了……$s"/end warpOut

Entries.3917590/n saloonSportsRoom/O Alex:
distantBanjo/-100 -100/farmer 31 20 0 Alex 32 7 0 Shane 33 8 0 Gus 34 8 0 Kent 35 8 0 George 36 7 0/skippable/specificTemporarySprite gridballGameTV/viewport 34 7 true/move farmer 0 -13 1 true/pause 1000/textAboveHead Alex "干得好！"/pause 600/jump Gus/pause 2000/textAboveHead George "进球！"/pause 400/textAboveHead Alex "走起来！"/faceDirection Kent 3 true/faceDirection Gus 1 true/animate Gus false true 100 22/animate Kent false true 100 17/shake Gus 500/shake Kent 500/pause 500/textAboveHead George "好样的！"/pause 1000/stopAnimation Gus/stopAnimation Kent/faceDirection Kent 0 true/faceDirection Gus 0/pause 1000/faceDirection Alex 3/pause 400/speak Alex "嘿，@！你做到了！$h"/faceDirection Alex 1/speak Alex "所以……你觉得呢？"/pause 500/emote farmer 8/faceDirection Alex 3/speak Alex "我一直在想……你知道我以前经常梦想有一天成为运动员吗？#$b#唔，最终结果是跟我想的有些不一样……$9#$b#不过别误会了，我还是很开心的！$h#$b#……但是我觉得如果能有一个地方可以让我们一起在里头看周日的比赛会很酷。格斯非常喜欢这个主意，他把他房子的里屋分出来一部分给我了！#$b#这样，我就可以用简单的办法，让我的“梦想”一直保持。"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 600/faceDirection George 3/speak George "你做得很好，孩子。我本来是可以在家里看的，但来这里让我感觉自己又年轻了！$h"/faceDirection Alex 1/speak Alex "谢谢，外公。"/pause 500/speak Kent "我很高兴能有个借口离开家，让我能够喘口气。"/faceDirection Alex 2/pause 100/textAboveHead Shane "我也一样"/pause 1200/
          speak Gus "我很开心。而且对生意也有好处！$h#$b#虽然谢恩可能不应该再吃爆炒青椒了……$h"/ -- changed from comment on shanes liver/
          pause 100/faceDirection Shane 2 true/animate Shane false true 100 18/jump Shane/pause 500/textAboveHead Shane "嘿！"/pause 500/emote Alex 32/pause 2000/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 400/message "看来他们有了一个新的周日常规活动。"/pause 1000/message "5000金花得很值！"/pause 1000/end dialogue Alex "再次感谢你的出资，@。对我来说这是个有趣的项目，并且看起来大伙都很高兴！"
